description: Is there a better combo than spicy chicken quesadillas with a side of creamy smashed avo? Make this cheesy, gluten-free recipe for lunch or dinner.
keywords: Quesadilla,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Budget,Soy free,Wheat free,Sandwich press,Chicken,Avocado,Peanut free
name: GlutenFree Cheesy Chicken Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small brown onion, thinly sliced into rounds
8 Free From Gluten white corn tortillas
0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked (plus etxra leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until light golden. Transfer to a bowl.
Heat remaining oil in same pan over mediumhigh heat. Add chicken and seasoning, then cook, stirring, for 4 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.

HowToTip.tipText: You can cook quesadillas in a large frying pan over medium-high heat, turning halfway through cooking. Cooking time may be slightly longer in a pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a sandwich press. Place tortillas on a flat surface. Top one half of each tortilla with spiced chicken, onion, corn, cheese and coriander. Fold tortillas over to enclose filling. Cook quesadillas in sandwich press, in batches, for 5 minutes or until golden and heated through.
Meanwhile, place avocado in a small bowl. Season. Using back of a fork, smash avocado until almost smooth.
Cut quesadillas cut into wedges and scatter over extra coriander. Serve with avocado and lime wedges.
